summary.div: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
summary.para: Defines event types for the interface.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_PLAY
member.summary: Playback has started. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_PAUSE
member.summary: Playback has paused. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_STOP
member.summary: Playback has stopped. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_POSITION_SET
member.summary: The MFPlay player object has seeked to a new playback position. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_RATE_SET
member.summary: The playback rate has changed. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_MEDIAITEM_CREATED
member.summary: A new media item was created. This event is sent when the or method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_MEDIAITEM_SET
member.summary: A media item is ready for playback. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_FRAME_STEP
member.summary: A frame-step operation has completed. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_MEDIAITEM_CLEARED
member.summary: The current media item was cleared. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_MF
member.summary: A pipeline object sent an event. The player object forwards certain pipeline events to the application. For more information, see .

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_PLAYBACK_ENDED
member.summary: Playback has ended. The player object sends this event when playback reaches the end of the media file.

member.name: MFP_EVENT_TYPE.MFP_EVENT_TYPE_ACQUIRE_USER_CREDENTIAL
member.summary: The media source requires authentication before it can play the file.
